item.description:
In the winter and spring, the MFA hosts their "MFAFirstFridays" on the first Friday evening of each month from 5:30-9:30pm. Wonderful art inside the Koch Gallery, mellow music, sundowners and tasty tapa's from the cash bar and the entertaining company and conversation of many of Boston's socially active singles are what you will find at this event.

Blow away the winter blahs and the spring rains with culture and style....
Upcoming event music / entertainment by:
April 2 - Grupo Fantasia Latin Ensemble
May 7 - Remix Jazz Trio
June 4 - Four Piece Suit

For additional information, see the MFA web-site at: MFA First Fridays

Meet up with your Hosts (Robyn & a couple of friends) at the MFA FENWAY entrance at 6:00pm, or find us inside the MFA thereafter.
[NOTE: The West Wing entrance closed back in 2009].

Please RSVP a firm Yes or No by Friday noon so that the Organizers know roughly how many / who to expect at the event. We will also e-mail a contact cellphone number to the YES RSVP list ONLY.

Any questions? Please e-mail Robyn.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the MFA FENWAY entrance at 6pm / find us inside the MFA thereafter
item.name: First Friday at the MFA - Sundowners, Art & Singles!
